TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed SubscriptionType extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies if a remote peer subscribed to the local peer can receive event notifications.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.SubscriptionType Allowed = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Specifies that a remote peer can subscribe to the local peer as well as receive event notifications.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.SubscriptionType Blocked = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Specifies that a remote peer can subscribe to the local peer, but will not receive event notifications.
